description:
Non-Material Amendment to planning application ref: P2020/1800/FUL for the "Application for full planning permission for amendments to the approved development (ref. P2015/5283/FUL) for the 'change of use of the building into seven residential dwellings (C3 use class), including extensions fronting Corinne Road at lower ground, ground floor and roof level and other external alterations including replacement timber windows with new timber windows throughout. Associated landscaping and new fencing' including those approved under non-material amendment application (ref. P2019/2733/NMA) for two new roof lights to the flat roof, the height of the ground floor door, introduction of some aluminium framed sliding doors and windows, reconfigured light well and new external stair providing access to cycle store. As well as the following additional alterations: (a) The deconstruction and reconstruction of the north-eastern external brickwork wall (b) Replacement of the original front dormer window facing Corinne Road with a new slate hung dormer window. (c) Replacement of the original roof including fascia board (d) Partial deconstruction and reconstruction of front porch." dated 18/03/2021.

The application seeks the following alterations:
(a) Internal configuration 
(b) At lower ground floor on the external paving outside the entrances to Flats 1 and 2 - changes to approved privacy screen to ensure that the screen is fire rated 
(c) At ground floor level to the North East elevation - change the material of 2 replacement obscure glazed living room windows from aluminium to timber and new fixed lower pane to bedroom window. 
(d) At first floor level to the South East Elevation - introduction of obscured glass to replacement bathroom timber sash window, and timber framed sash window style AOV extract to hallway window.
